modName: CHSBHC v3 and ADM  --  BBP TBBP Nude Body replacers---
summary:
Updated [u]CHSBHC[/u] and  [u]Brazilian supermodel body[/u].
- Hopefully fewer seams than the original -
- CBBE 3.2, CHSBHC Textures supported -

* It\'d be awesome if someone could make these bodies in BBBB  :D  *
descriptionHtml:
[IMG=center]http://imageshack.us/a/img834/1296/banner2new.png[/IMG]
*** If I\'m overstepping bounds with CherryHotaling\'s , XP32\'s work, a PM would be nice.  Thanks.  ***

Scrutinize my rounding skills folks.  Labeled \"1.5\" and \"Test.\"  Hopefully the last update.  Comment on what is best  :]

* It\'d be awesome if someone could make these bodies BBBB  :D  *

*********************************************************************************************
--- Added a modified XP32 \"Back Hip Dagger, Chesko\" skeleton for ---
--- higher beast tails and moved weaponry.  May be clipping and floating. ---
*********************************************************************************************

[IMG=center]http://imageshack.us/a/img842/7258/description2.png[/IMG]

CHSBv3 is a slightly modified CHSBHC.  ADM is a very Brazilian-model superbody.
- CBBE 3.2 +, CHSBHC Textures supported -

[u]CHSBv3 (Cherry Hotaling\'s Super Busty H-Cup v3)[/u]
When compared to the original, the new small weight body is slightly larger (slightly larger CBBE).
         The heavy body is about the same as before, large top and bottom.

[u]ADM (Â¡Ay Dios Mio!)[/u]
Massive assets, tiny waist. I\'m a booty man, but also an engineer so distribution is key ;)
         Personal favorite.  

[IMG=center]http://imageshack.us/a/img195/9498/misc2.png[/IMG]

[u]Large Butts and Beast Tails Skeletons[/u]
I modified the xp32 skeleton \"Back Hip Dagger, Chesko\" to raise the tails of the Argonian and Khajiit female as well as move the weaponry away from the larger bodies.  As always, there will be clipping, floating weapons.  Sorry.

Tell me please if the tails are too high.  

1) must download new tails from here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2995
2) must install xp32\'s v1.7 skeletons/animations first : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26800
3) override with this/these skeletons

-----------------------------------------------------------
Seams should only be visible on the neck and even then, should be near indistinguishable  :D

The goal with this was to create a less jarring \"weight slide\" body (i.e. in game weight control),
          but that did not happen, probably never will because I can\'t weight paint, texture, UV, etc.
-----------------------------------------------------------

If anyone is still into [u]CHSBHC[/u], try this out.  It\'s not ground breaking at all  :)
          It\'s more like a seam update if anything.

[IMG=center]http://imageshack.us/a/img6/5552/install2.png[/IMG]

[u]Requirements[/u]:
  NMM, Fnis 3.5 or newer, CBBE 3.2 (optional), 
               Original CHSBHC (optional), this/these mod(s)  :D

1) (Optional) install CBBE 3.2 for textures, or any CBBE 3.2 texture source *will* work (theoretically).

2) (Optional) install CHSBHC for BBP skeleton, animations (there are lots of BBP animations on the internets, don\'t limit yourself to the Madam\'s mod)

3) install Fnis, check the \"arm fix,\" run Fnis.

4) install one [CHSBv3] - [ADM] to replace the CBBE/CHSBHC meshes.

5) install a custom skeleton for TBBP, allows the use of BBP armors and generally a good idea for custom bodies.

6) (optional) BEAST RACES may want to install my modified XP32 skeleton for big butts and tails.
      ---Will update soon If I can figure out how to edit 1.6\'s skeletons.---

7) Enjoy?  Assuming clothes happen soon  :(

[IMG=center]http://imageshack.us/a/img27/6782/uninstall2.png[/IMG]

Run the installation guide in reverse (Fnis is like a \"must have\" program, so maybe don\'t uninstall Fnis) 
  whilst looking at a picture of a sad panda.

[IMG=center]http://imageshack.us/a/img835/7923/changes2.png[/IMG]

v1.0 - initial
v1.1 - idealistic changes
v1.2 - corrections and destruction
v1.3 - proportioning adjustments
v1.4 - proportioning adjustments, TBBP is out, seams should be at a minimum.
v1.5 - Complete asset proportioning on both body types, both bounce types, Near perfect bilateral symmetry
          Maybe no new seams, complete fixing of seams, etc.

Future Updates:  [u]Give to me feedback[/u]  :)

[IMG=center]http://imageshack.us/a/img694/5503/issues2.png[/IMG]

- Game crashing, then stabilizing.  Because Skyrim likes to crash  :)

- Bodies are *almost* round.  I can\'t round at all in a 3d space. Help?

- Hopefully someone can add verts and still have this CBBE texture compatible?

[IMG=center]http://imageshack.us/a/img199/9197/essentials2.png[/IMG]

[u]Developers[/u]:
CherryHotaling - CHSBHC and BBP.
b3lisario - slapping me with his genius.
sbseed - putting up with my BS. ADM proportions.
ozzking - the jerk and lazy bum  :D
Dragonfly - TBBP, and it\'s crazy behaviors

[u]Thanks To[/u]:
DarkWolfModding for the readme generator.
NMM for being drunk and still being cool.
xp32 - Thanks for the skeleton !!!
fh8 - The forum post made the tail position happen  :D
billystanton - for the CBBE beast tails.
Dragonfly - TBBP, and it\'s crazy behaviors

[IMG=center]http://imageshack.us/a/img841/61/endbanner2.png[/IMG]
